meanings.definition: To include or involve mutually or reciprocally.
meanings.sent1: The two friends interinvolving their secrets.
meanings.sent3: The interinvolving of cats and dogs in the movie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions and thoughts interinvolving like a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The dance performance was a beautiful interinvolving of music and movement.

meanings.definition: To have a close relationship or connection with something else.
meanings.sent2: The success of the team interinvolving with hard work.
meanings.sent3: The interinvolving of the two main characters in the story was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: Their destinies interinvolving like intertwined threads.
meanings.sent5: The bond between the siblings was an unbreakable interinvolving connection.
